attributes.action: Close all borders and suspend all flights into the UK until Coronavirus is over.
attributes.additional_details:
It will allow focuse on the people already in the country rather than having more cases of coronavirus into the Country from other country.

Safeguard Britain and help the NHS.
attributes.background: I urge the government to close all borders and stop flights coming into the UK to avoid further spread of coronavirus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
